categories: Category:Battles of the early Imperial campaigns

nodes.text: The Bombardment of Haruun Kal was undertaken by the Galactic Empire, shortly after the end of the Clone Wars.
Spurred on by the records Mace Windu made during his mission to the planet, the Imperial Navy bombarded the planet's surface.

In 40 ABY, scholars believed that the action had killed off all Korunnai. However, as the world was represented in the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances, presumably the Balawai continued to exist. As it turned out, at least three Korunnai still lived during 5 ABY, namely Kar Vastor, Nick Rostu, and Lorz Geptun.
